item.title: China's Commerce Ministry held talks with Walmart after report on price cut demand, state media says
item.description: Chinese and American companies should "work together" to respond to U.S. "unilateral imposition of tariffs," Chinese state media said.

item.title: Ukraine agrees to U.S.-led ceasefire plan if Russia accepts
item.description: The agreement came after more than seven hours of negotiations in Saudi Arabia between high-level American and Ukrainian delegations.

item.title: Trump meets with CEOs at Business Roundtable as market sell-off continues

item.title: Trump will not impose 50% Canadian steel, aluminum tariffs tomorrow, says top trade advisor
